name: CosmicConveyor
description:
The web demo of the new upcoming  factory sand box game CosmicConveyor.

You place and build tiles, machine to mine and process asteroid to sell for money, mine and process to create power to power those machines. 

Controlls:

- Use the bar at the bottom right to select which tile to place.

- Left click to place, right click to delete.

-Mouse wheel to rotate.

-Press and hold the scroll wheel to drag around the map.

We have a very small discord server where I post more regular updates and developments: https://discord.gg/XWAspcgA
